paragraph.paragraph: As opposed to other execution commands, this command launches an application compiled in finalized mode. This has the same effect as running the application in the EIFGEN/F_code directory from a console prompt.
No debugging is possible with this command, but it lets you test the real speed of your program without any overhead.

It is accessible through the project toolbar (
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_run_color.gif ) or through the project menu.
